title: Fix confidence bands not refreshing/aligning with selected forecast scenario

sections.text: Confidence bands (P10/P50/P90 or equivalent) do not consistently update when the user switches scenarios or changes the forecast horizon, causing the displayed uncertainty range to mismatch the underlying projection. Ensure confidence band calculations are recomputed from the active scenario inputs and that the UI re-renders bands alongside totals and segment breakdowns. Add a regression test covering scenario switch + horizon change to confirm bands stay in sync.
